data.text: Ao, Onyankopɔn, adɛn nti na woapo yɛn koraa yi?
Kae nkurɔfo a wotɔɔ wɔn teteete no,
Dan wʼanammɔntu kyerɛ saa nnwiriwii a ɛto ntwa da yi,
Wʼatamfo bobɔɔ mu wɔ faako a wuhyiaa yɛn no;
Wɔyɛɛ wɔn sɛ nnipa a wɔrehwim mmonnua
Wɔde wɔn mmonnua ne nname
Wɔhyew wo kronkronbea no dwerɛbee;
Wɔkaa wɔ wɔn koma mu se, “Yebetiatia wɔn so ayɛ wɔn pasaa!”
Wɔmmaa yɛn nsɛnkyerɛnne a ɛyɛ nwonwa biara;
Onyankopɔn, wʼatamfo bɛserew wo akosi da bɛn?
Adɛn nti na woatwe wo nsa, wo nsa nifa no?
Nanso Onyankopɔn yɛ me hene fi tete;
Ɛyɛ wo na wode wo tumi paee po mu no;
Wopɛtɛw Lewiatan no ti
Wo na womaa nsuwa ne nsuti tuei;
Adekyee wɔ wo na adesae nso yɛ wo dea;
Ɛyɛ wo na wototoo asase so ahye nyinaa;
Awurade, kae sɛnea ɔtamfo no aserew wo,
Mmfa wʼaborɔnoma nkwa mma nkekaboa;
Ma wʼapam no ho nhia wo,
Mma wɔn a wɔhyɛ wɔn so no mmfa animguase nsan;
Ao, Onyankopɔn, ma wo ho so na ka wo ara wʼasɛm;
Mmu wʼani ngu wɔn a wɔsɔre tia wo no nteɛteɛmu so,
